subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Griner scored 17 points, Tina Charles added 15, and the United States routed France, 94-72, in the quarterfinals of the women’s world championship in Istanbul.
snippet: Griner scored 17 points, Tina Charles added 15, and the United States routed France, 94-72, in the quarterfinals of the women’s world championship in Istanbul.
